Package no.geosoft.sodirio.stratigraphy

Class SodirStratigraphyManager

java.lang.Object
no.geosoft.sodirio.stratigraphy.SodirStratigraphyManager
public final class SodirStratigraphyManager extends Object
Class to group convenient stratigraphy functionality
Author:
Jacob Dreyer

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SodirStratigraphyManager()
    Create a SodirStratigraphyManager instance based on all Sodir stratigraphy data.

  • Constructor Details

    • SodirStratigraphyManager

      public SodirStratigraphyManager() throws IOException
      Create a SodirStratigraphyManager instance based on all Sodir stratigraphy data.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the read operation fails for some reason.

  • Method Details

    • getStratigraphyByFormation

      public List<SodirStratigraphy> getStratigraphyByFormation(String formationName)
      Find all stratigraphy instances of a specific formation.
      Parameters:
      formationName - Name of formation to find stratigraph instances for. Non-null.
      Returns:
      Requested stratigraph instances. Null if not found.

    • getStratigraphyByGroup

      public List<SodirStratigraphy> getStratigraphyByGroup(String groupName)
      Find all stratigraphy instances of a specific group.
      Parameters:
      groupName - Name of group to find stratigraphy for. Non-null.
      Returns:
      Requested stratigraphy. Never null.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If groupName is null.

    • getWellboreStratigraphy

      public List<SodirWellboreStratigraphy> getWellboreStratigraphy()
      Return a list of all SodirWellboreStratigraphy instances.
      Returns:
      List of all SodirWellboreStratigraphy instances. Never null.

    • getWellboreStratigraphy

      public SodirWellboreStratigraphy getWellboreStratigraphy(String wellboreName)
      Return a SodirWellboreStratigraphy instance for a specific wellbore.
      Parameters:
      wellboreName - Name of wellbore of SodirStratigraphy to find.
      Returns:
      The requested stratigraphy instance, or null if not found.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If wellboreName is null.

    • getWellboreStratigraphy

      public SodirWellboreStratigraphy getWellboreStratigraphy(int npdId)
      Return a SodirWellboreStratigraphy instance with a specific wellbore id.
      Parameters:
      npdId - Wellbore NPDID of a SodirStratigraphy instance.
      Returns:
      SodirWellboreStratigraphy instance with a specific wellbore id. Null if not found.

    • getLithostratigraphy

      public List<SodirStratigraphy> getLithostratigraphy()
      Return all stratigraphy instances.
      Returns:
      All stratigraphy instances. Never null.
